nodes.text: The Khoan system was located in the Phelleem sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It was home to the sentient Khoan species as well as the creatures known as Khoanian slime crabs.
The Khoan system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square S-7.
